attributes.additional_details: If you this cannot be done - then abolish Grammer school system completely so that kids in every corner of the country get the level playing stage.
attributes.background: This will help in reducing the unnecessary move that parents have to make to be in the Grammar school catchment area. This will help in reducing the skyrocketing house prices, and people will not have to pay huge premiums to be in the Grammar school catchment area.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do. We're not sure if you want the UK Government and Parliament to make it a requirement that grammar schools be opened in every English city, or that grammar school places be made available to all children in England (whether or not they live in or near a city). 

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
